episodes.title: BNZ court ruling against Gloriavale. What do Leavers think?
episodes.description: Monday 9th December, 2024 Gloriavale lost its bid to keep its bank accounts open with BNZ. They have fought this issue in the courts for two years after BNZ indicated it wanted to shut their accounts after a 2022 Employment Court ruling found Gloriavale had been involved in child and forced labour. They stated it breached their human rights policy. Listen up as the issue was discussed in news articles and talkback radio by a lawyer, leavers and advocate.

episodes.title: Escaping Utopia Trailer
episodes.description:
New Zealand’s most extreme religious cult, Gloriavale, and the true stories of people attempting to break free, are the subject of a brand-new docuseries – Escaping Utopia – screening this March on TVNZ.

In a worldwide premiere, screening across three captivating nights, Escaping Utopia documents the intricate planning that goes into clandestine escapes from Gloriavale – with unprecedented access to its inner workings, the unravelling of its leadership and the pursuit of justice by the group of passionate and dedicated people known as The Gloriavale Leavers’ Support Trust.

Shocking new information is revealed from former and current members of the community who have never gone on the record before – and who through their accounts, seek answers to some of the most crucial questions in the dark history of Gloriavale.

The three-part investigation premieres Sunday 24 March, 8.30pm on TVNZ 1 and TVNZ+ and continues Monday 25 and Tuesday 26.

Escaping Utopia is produced by Warner Bros. International Television Production New Zealand in association with the New Zealand Government’s Premium Productions for International Audiences Fund and made with the support of NZ on Air. The series is directed by Natalie Malcon and Justin Pemberton, with Philippa Rennie as Executive Producer.

episodes.title: Cult Chat Episode 12   Two  Worlds Collide   Exclusive Brethren
Setting the Record Straight on Gloriavale - Full Deep Dive Version
episodes.description:
Watch leavers and current members of Gloriavale debunk dodging politicians in the lead up to the 2023 election. Enjoy Rebecca Wright (from the The Nation) and her attempt to get straight answers out of the Government, followed by honest commentary from people who have lived experience in this cult. Are the children at Gloriavale safe? 
Shorter version available here: https://studio.youtube.com/video/GIqi8KQyDP4/edit

episodes.title: Ex-Gloriavale girls and lawyers talk to the Press after the historic Employment Court win!
episodes.description: Six ex-cultists took on Gloriavale (and the Government) in a historic case and won! The Employment Court recognised them as employees during their time in the strict religious community - where they were born to follow a predictable path - which included working on the teams to cook, clean, and do washing for community's 600 members. Volunteers get choice. These girls didn't. Judgment delivered July 2023.

episodes.title: Rosanna Overcomer makes closing statements at the Royal Commission into Abuse
Gloriavale’s Lawyer gives closing statements at the Royal Commission into Abuse Hearing.
The Project: Interview with James Harrison
episodes.description: The Project asks James Harrison about John Ready's lawsuit against Gloriavale, and also about James' life since he left there five years ago.
